data.meta_description: Lovin' You ((Misia 1999) [Live Version]) Lyrics by Mísia. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
Loving you is easy ′cause you're beautiful Making love with you is all I wanna do Loving you is more than just a dream come true And everything that I do is out of loving you La la la... No one else can make me feel The colors that you bring Stay with me while we grow old And we will live each day in spring time ′Cause loving you has made my life so beautiful And every day of my life is filled with loving you Loving you I see your sun come shining through And everytime that we, ooh I'm more in love with you La la la... La la la... Writer(s): Minnie Riperton, Richard J. Rudolph
